Package org.gbif.api.service.checklistbank

Interface DescriptionService

All Superinterfaces:
NameUsageExtensionService<Description>
public interface DescriptionService extends NameUsageExtensionService<Description>
Service interface for Description Interface methods. This is the public interface providing methods for retrieving Description. These methods will for the most part return a Description object.
See Also:

    • get

      @Nullable Description get(int key)
      Retrieve a description by its key. The portal species pages rely on this method to asynchroneously load species descriptions.
      Parameters:
      key - that identifies a description
